1.content:
"Wow! I can't believe how great this has been going! I got myself a first mate, a navigator, a cook, a doctor, and a archeologist!" grinned Monkey D. Luffy, standing on the figurehead of his ship. Suddenly, he began slipping and was about to fall in the water when a hand grabbed him.

"Calm down Luffy!" shouted Zoro, Luffy's first mate and a master swordsman. "You know you sink like a rock!"

Nami, the crew's navigator, then went, "Bet you five minutes later he'll be on it again,"

"This crew needs more women. I love to have more beauties like Nami and Nico around," said Sanji, as the cook sat back, smoking his cigarette.

"You want more crazy, hard hitting girls around?" asked Chopper, the reindeer who ate the Huma-Huma fruit and the crew's doctor, just before Sanji's leg came down on his head.

"Save it, Chopper. Men like that never grow up," said Nico Robin, the archeologist and former Miss All Sunday.

"Hey Luffy! You forgot me!" shouted Usopp, the long-nosed crewmate scowling.

"Uh, what are you again?" asked Zoro, "Are you the gunman? You spend more time..."

WHAM!!!

"I got tired of waiting!"

"What the?!!!" shouted Sanji, a hole opened in the deck. Standing there was a large, fat woman with long purple hair. Her belly stuck out from under her shirt, and her hair was down to her well-rounded, big butt. The girl was clad in an armless shirt with pants that squeezed and hugged her jello-like legs and thighs.

"Hi there! The name's Debuki!" smiled the girl.

"WHERE'D SHE COME FROM?!!!" shouted Usopp, shocked.

"Wow, you're all soft and jiggly," said Luffy, the not-too bright rubber man poking Debuki's belly in curosity.

Debuki grinned, before grabbing Luffy's head and giving him a huge kiss on the lips.

"You're cuter in person than in real life," said Debuki.

"Spill it...what are you here for?" asked Zoro, pulling out one of his three swords.

"To join up with the Straw Hat Crew of course! You guys are going to be big, I just know it!" smiled Debuki.

"Whoa..." went Luffy, a bit dazed from Debuki's kiss.

"Doing what for us?" asked Nami, raising an eyebrow.

Debuki pointed a jiggling arm to the left, saying, "50 feet to the west...there's a small rock with a red lobster crawling on it. He's between the moss and a rock,"

"Oh yeah, like anyone..." began Usopp, taking a telescope, before drawing his jaw. "NO WAY!!! SHE'S RIGHT!!!"

"I've trained my eyes since childhood," smiled Debuki, "I can see further than a telescope when I focus, and I can see to the smallest detail. I'm going to be the lookout!"

"Alright! Debuki's our new lookout!" shouted Luffy, smiling.

"She looks like she can enjoy a good meal," thought Sanji with a grin.

"Hmmm...another girl on this ship would be nice, even a fat one," thought Nico and Nami.

"Well, I'm going off. Chopper, would you give me a hand with training?" asked Zoro, before taking Chopper off.

"What's with him?" asked Debuki.

"Old sword boy never trusts anyone at first," said Sanji, "Go figure,"

"You two have eaten the devil fruits, haven't you?" asked Debuki to Luff and Nico. "It's ok. I've eaten one too,"

"Huh?" asked Luffy, "Which one?"

"The Fat-Fat Fruit," smiled Debuki, before taking a breath and suddenly her body began swelling up and up, making her larger and larger.

"Whoa!!!" went Usopp.

"I fight using my entire body. Body slamming, grappling...it's all enhanced by being this huge. As an added bonus, the fruit makes my skin stronger," smiled Debuki, before deflating back to her regular fat size.

"Uh, no offense, but don't do that again to extreme, or you may sink us, much less fit in the crow's nest," said Nami.

"No prob," said Debuki, before everyone went back to their normal activities. Debuki then decided to spend time with...

1323.content:
"Franky! Where the hell are you?" Debuki was wandering around the ship, and saw that there was grass on the deck, a room on top of the watchtower, and she could have sworn she smelled cola from the bottom of the ship.

Where the hell am I? Debuki wondered. This isn't the Going Merry, that's for sure.

"You like this ship? Well, I built it.", spoke a baritone voice. Debuki turned around, and saw everything she said that the Straw Hats didn't have: an overly macho shipwright who loves cola, has a tendency to say "SUPAH!", and wore a speedo.

"I'm sorry, who are you?"

"My name is Franky! Ow!" Franky went in a pose.

"So, what ship is this?" Debuki asked.

Franky replied. "It's the Thousand Sunny, or as I like to call it, the most super ship I've ever built!"

"Right..." Debuki then asked, "Wait, I was under the impression that there was only 7 of you, and just 3 who have bounties. What did I miss?"

Then Franky filled her in. "Well, long story short, Robin was taken by the World Government, Long-nose briefly left, and I was previously their enemy. Skip to Luffy declaring war on the World Government, Enies Lobby being destroyed, Robin breaking Spandam's spine, the Going Merry breaking, and three days later, BOOM! Robin and Usopp are back, the crew gets this ship, and I'm one of them! So..." Franky said, catching his breath, "Did you get all of that?"

"Yes." Debuki said.

"Good!... So, what's the heck do you want to do?"
1323.title: Traditional One Piece Logic

choices: "I think I'll try this fat thing out."
13233.content:
"Wow, not even trying to be subtle, are you?"

"I know, I suck..." Debuki was down in the dumps.

Then Franky said, "Hey, I like your honesty about what you want to do, even if it is weird."

"Thanks, I guess..?"

"You're welcome, now go and do what you want to do!"

And so, Debuki found her way to the women's quarters, where she saw Nami, confused for some reason."

"Hey, Nami." Debuki said.

"Oh, hi Debuki." Nami replied. "I was just looking through my maps, and I was confused at this place called Thriller Bark, but I don't know what that place is."

"Oh, OK."

"But enough about me," Nami said. "I want to know about you."

Debuki saw her chance. "Well, I ate the Fat-Fat, remember?"

"Yeah, I've been meaning to ask about that: aren't you upset in the slightest that your Devil Fruit made you fat?"

Debuki then said, "Truth be told, I was fat before the fruit."

"Huh, is that right?" Nami was interested.

And so Debuki explained: "You see, people spend too much time trying to stay thin, and they do that by eating salads, and they go on diets too. Though in the longrun, we're all gonna die someday, so I figured, why the heck should we be skinny when we could be fat? You can eat what you want, you can always be warm, and you have more padding. Now you may have this thing," she poked at her chubby belly, "but it's well worth eating what you want."

Nami thought it over. I can't believe I'm actually considering this. Then again, who cares about my looks in the long run? I could eat what I wanted, when ever I wanted. Hmm...

"Long... Ring... Long Land? What the hell is that place?"

"NAMIIII, I GOT YOU SOME DESSERTS TO EAT FOR YOUR HARD WORK!"

Nami looked over to her door and wondered, What the hell could Sanji possibly be bringing?

"Um, yeah! You can just leave it in here!"

"Oookaaayy, deeeaar!" Sanji came in, and as he was putting the plate on her desk, he noticed something. "Long Ring Long Land? What the hell is that?"

"That's what I'm wondering!" Nami responded.

"Well, anyways, enjoy your dessert, Nami swaaan." He left thereafter.

"Hm, I wonder what his deal is... eh, whatever." As Nami thought out loud, the smell of the cake was overpowering. "Smells good! Sanji really outdid himself this time."

And then Nami's belly grumbled. "That's odd, usually that doesn't happen. Ah well! Time to dig in!"

Nami grabbed a fork and took a bite out of the cake, and was frozen in place, due to how awesome the cake was.

"This is too good!" Nami ended up shoveling the entire thing in her mouth ravenously, until it was gone, and into her newly protruding belly. "BUUUURRRRP!" She belched.

And so sat Nami with chocolate all over her mouth, and a food baby.

info.description: I noticed there was never a One Piece interactive, much less a FA one. Due to the manga still changing, I can not set this to the current arc. This is set after Nico Robin joined and before the Going Merry was wrecked. Now the crew seems to be going well in the Grand Line, but they didn't realize their lives were going to change when a new stranger hopped onto their boat...
